message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a [product description] that I believe is worth a lot to the right person. I'm offering it to you for $15000. This is a fair price considering its value, but I'm open to negotiation. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11000 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $11000 is a good starting point, I'm still a bit away from my desired price. How about we meet in the middle at $13000? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $12500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
